verses.roman:
ei-mate haridāsera eka vatsara gela
tabu mahāprabhura mane prasāda nahila

synonyms: ei-mate—in this way; haridāsera—of Junior Haridāsa; eka vatsara—one year; gela—passed; tabu—still; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mane—in the mind; prasāda nahila—there were no symptoms of mercy.
translation: In this way a complete year passed for Junior Haridāsa, but still there was not a sign of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's mercy toward him.
